p.text: Pharmacy Management System is designed to fill the void when a Pharmacy want to run its business and HR management automated.

This can handle daily business including inventory management, order placement, HR personnel management, supply chain management as well as information management of all other related stakeholders such as Doctor, Patient , Hospital, Diseases etc.
This system reduce the manula task which is time consuming and prone to error as well as vulnerable to theft and misinformation.
Goal of conceptual model is to provide a view of the potential database application that is completely independent of physical system.
This is an opportunity to create "perfect world" prototype that may lead to improved database.
This provides ways to describe how data will be used by system.
This describes different kinds of functionality that the database application can provide.
Different tools used for conceptual data model
What Disease , Which Doctor , Which Supplier
How many of What Drug is available
Which drug is below minimum quantity
Who sell What Drug at What Price
We have contacted "Nava Drug House" in order to get better understading of the business process and requirement analysis for our project.
Computer Science and Engineering Discipline, Khulna University,
No alert message to remind for the critical quantity of each drug.
No way to make inquiry about the pharmacy data.
No automated process in manipulating data such as add, insert, delete and search.
There is a difficulty on store the data which wastes resources as well as time to retrieve the necessary data from the manually based data system.
Impossible to analysis the business flow
1. To develop a prototype of pharmacy management Information system.
2. To computerized the manual task in term of pharmacy stock inventory
3. To apply string match searching algorithm technique in order to search
4. The appropriate drugs based on the description of drugs.
5. To analysis large volume of data regarding medicines, patients and supply chain.
6. A summarized list of drugs dispensed to patient can be viewed for monitoring purposes.
7. To generate report on the list of drugs dispensed in the polyclinic for a given time period.
8. Automated decision based on data and automated alert for different notification required for Pharmacists.
9. To ensure that the system is user friendly.
10. To be able to generate report within a specified period of time.
11. To ensure the expiry date of medicines.
12. To give the facility to the customer to order medicine online.
13. To maintain a timely selling amount.
14. To provide the main use of a medicine.
15. To provide functions on identify medication usages instruction, minimize human errors.
This application will focus on drug profile and information management system
To integrate data collection and processing along with presentation of information that helps pharmacists to make evidence based decisions making for pharmaceutical services.
Goal of Logical data model is to construct data model for application thats based on a particular kind of model but still dependent of any DBMS as well as other physical system
Coustomer (cID, cName, sex, birthdate, cHome, cOffice, cCell, cStreet, cCity, cState, cZIP, cEmail, pID)
Staff (aID, aName, aPhone, aStreet, aCity, aState, aZIP, aEmail)
Supplier (sID, sName, sPhone, sWebsite, sStreet, sCity, sState, sZIP, sEmail)
Doctor (docID, docName, docAffiliation, docPhone, docStreet, docCity, docState, docZIP,docEmail)
Drug (drugID, sID, expireDate, description, manufacturer, sideeffects)
Order (orderID, cID, date, amount, deliveryAddress, deliveryDate, deliverystatus, aID)
Goal of Physical data model is to produce description of implenetation of the database into the DBMS
Database was created in SQl Server
1. It is possible for company to generate Monthly/Daily Report on different business logic
2. Inventory management become better than never
3. There is more transparency and transactions are all recorded
5. Reduce massive amount of manual work
Search for Drug information & Generate Report
Search for Order information & Generate Report
In this system we can make queries to collect information about the selling condition of a pharmacy.
• How many medicine have been sold at a period?
• The earned money in total at a period of time?
Queries about sell at any time:
In this system one of the best thing is that we can make queries about the medicine information.
• How many medicines are of X company?
• What is the best use of the medicine?
• Search medicine giving description as input.
• Which medicines have been produced in X year?
Using our proposed System we can make query to have information about
• Detail About patient who have taken medicine from our pharmacy
• Prizes of medicines having same description but of different company.
Which doctor is seeing more patient now a days?
Which kind of medicines are suggested by doctor much?
Which Doctor Prefers Which Drug for Which Disease?
How many medicines are left in stock?
Which medicines are at large amount?
Monthly/ Daily Report for Drug Sell
Report for Supplier to understand the demand for different Drug
35 Different combination of SQL Syntax has been used in this project
